author: Thomas
content:
Just out of curiosity, a more technical question: What do you do with the photoshop files? I guess, you keep them? I'm starting to experience some problems with the sheer size of the files. Makes collecting them a bit problematic, even in the age of 1/2 terrabyte harddrives...

Your symphony in blue is a real rhapsody in blue...ðŸ˜‰
